text.text: Fully certified processing facility located in the town of Cobalt

The acquisition achieves a key goal of becoming a vertically integrated leader in Canada’s silver-cobalt heartland with multiple potential revenue streams: bullion pouring, bulk sampling, commercial assaying and e-waste processing.

Located within just 50 meters of a rail line and just a short distance from Canada Cobalt’s Castle and Beaver properties, the facility will also become the new home of the Company’s environmentally friendly Re-2OX Process.
